title: Foundational HRD and Instructional Design Course Utilizing a Socio-Ecological Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Public education program engaging diverse social groups, emphasizing integration of participants' lived experiences into learning

learning_goals: The core concepts of the socioecological framework can be explained and applied to Human Resource Development (HRD) practices
A instructional design model can be developed that considers interactions at the individual-organization-society levels
A project-based learning design and evaluation plan can be established to solve community problems
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
